Query.Sql: select NHSNumber as nhs_number, coalesce(ReferralToTreatmentPeriodEndDate, CDSActivityDate) as death_date from [omop_staging].[sus_OP] where ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStatus = 36 and (CDSActivityDate is not null or ReferralToTreatmentPeriodEndDate is not null) and NHSNumber is not null group by NHSNumber

Explanation.Description: Discharge date of the patient's spell.
